system.effect: The attack knocks the target sprawling on the ground. The target suffers [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue, is flung [[1d5]] metres away from the attacker (stopping if he hits a solid object), and falls Prone. He is Stunned for 2 rounds.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Body (Severity 6)

The attack knocks the target sprawling on the ground. The target suffers [[1d5]] levels of Fatigue, is flung [[1d5]] metres away from the attacker (stopping if he hits a solid object), and falls Prone. He is Stunned for 2 rounds.
